news.title: Cherry Blossoms Blooming in The Big Apple
news.explanation: The cherry blossom trees are blooming ahead of schedule in New York's Central Park after a warm winter

news.title: 1 Dead, 2 Injured In Skiing Accidents On Mount Washington
news.explanation: Several skiers suffered falls amid dangerous conditions over the weekend.

news.title: Louisiana Declares A Disaster - For Crawfish
news.explanation: Louisiana's governor says rhe shortage is not only affecting Louisiana's economy but also our way of life.
